description: This file defines a web extraction agent using Python, leveraging Pydantic models for structured data, and integrates with external tools for web crawling and content extraction. It sets up an agent to extract structured information from web pages, including titles, descriptions, content sections, links, contact info, and metadata.

classes.name: ContentSection
classes.description: Represents a section of content from the webpage, including optional heading and content text.

classes.name: PageInformation
classes.description: Structured representation of a webpage, including URL, title, description, features, content sections, links, contact info, and metadata.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent to extract structured information from a specified webpage URL.
